lines: IN JOYFUL HIGH AND HOLY WAYS
1. Tindleleni To Tsakisa, Moya Wanga Wu Ta Khensa;
I Mani Loyi A Yimbelelaka, Rirhandzu Ra Yesu.
Rirhandzu Ro Hlamarisa, Ro Rirhandzu Ra Yesu; Rirhandzu Ro Hlamarisa, Ro Rirhandzu Ra Yesu.
2. Ra Tsakisa Nanhlikani, I Ku Rhula Navusiku;
Ra Tshungula Hambi Wona Mavabyi, Rirhandzu Ra Yesu.
3. I Tshemba Ra Ndzivalelo, Ra Ndzi Pfuxa Loko Ndzi Wa;
Evutonâ€™wini Na Kona Ku Feni, Rirhandzu Ra Yesu.
